definition: hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: Which soup do you want? We have Eggdrop Soup with Sliced Tomatoes, Famous Hot &Sour Soup.
sentences.chinese: 您来点什么汤？我们有番茄蛋花汤，酸辣汤。

sentences.english: Paggy tell Paul, hot and sour soup is very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 佩琪告诉保罗，酸辣汤非常的好喝。

sentences.english: Which do you prefer, sour peppery soup or four-jewel soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢什么汤，酸辣汤还是四宝汤？

sentences.english: Hmm…Black pepper beef, fried shrimp and hot&sour soup.
sentences.chinese: 嗯黑胡椒牛柳，油煎大虾，再来个酸辣汤吧。

sentences.english: We've got hot and sour soup and seaweed soup.
sentences.chinese: 我们有酸辣汤和紫菜汤。

sentences.english: We'll take the Sichuan hot and sour soup.
sentences.chinese: 我们来份川味酸辣汤吧。

sentences.english: Hot and Sour soup is a standard in Chinese cuisine in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，酸辣汤是标准的中国菜。

sentences.english: We have frozen dumplings again become a hot and sour soup?
sentences.chinese: 我们有速冻水饺，再做个酸辣汤吧？

sentences.english: Hot and sour soup, please, and that's enough for me.
sentences.chinese: 来酸辣汤吧，我想这些菜已经够了。

sentences.english: I really like this sweet and sour soup.
The Sichuan Hot and Sour Soup is very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 要不要来一碗汤？四川酸辣汤味道很好的。

sentences.english: I enjoy going to Chinese restaurants and ordering coke and hot and sour soup.
sentences.chinese: 我非常喜欢到中国餐馆和订购焦炭和酸辣汤。

sentences.english: That spicy soup gave me a terrible stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 那个酸辣汤害我肚子好痛。

sentences.english: The lot and sour soup is always a favorite with our customers. It's typical Chinese soup.
sentences.chinese: 酸辣汤一直受到顾客的青睐，这是典型的中国汤菜。

definition: mapo tofu/stir-fried beancurd in chili sauce
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
duck's blood and beef tripe in spicy soup
